#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

int N, ans, pos;
vector<int> A;

int bs(int val){
	int start = -1;
	int end = N-1;
	while(end - start > 1){
		if(A[(end+start)/2] > val)
			end = (start+end)/2;
		else
			start = (start+end)/2;
	}
	return end;
}

int main(){
	cin >> N;
	while(N != 0){
		A.assign(N, 0);
		for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
			cin >> A[i];
		sort(A.begin(), A.end());
		ans = 0;
		for(int i=0;i<N;i++){
			for(int j=i+1;j<N;j++){
				if(A[i]+A[j] < A[N-1]){
					pos = bs(A[i]+A[j]);
					ans += (N-pos);
				}
			}
		}
		cout << ans << endl;
		cin >> N;
	}
	return 0;
}
